mapper.select: SELECT idx,mref,writer,content,to_char(createdAt,'yyyy-MM-dd am hh:mi') regDate ,ip FROM communityComments c WHERE mref=#{mref} ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM communityComments c WHERE mref=#{mref}
